resources.string: CallerNameTrackerBD needs the following permission(s): android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE,android.permission.READ_CONTACTS.phone state permission is needed because when incomimg call arrives, this app should be triggered to get the name of the caller. Contact permission is needed because this app uses everyones contact to search incoming number to get the corresponding name. Contacts are saved securely and they are not disclosed to any third party. Information related to the User or Contact Information will be used to: automatically display the callerâ€™s name when a call is received, as enabled by the Enhanced Search functionality to Users who have activated that functionality, and indicate possible common connections with the caller or when an incoming call may be spam.The contact Information is stored on secured servers and protected by secured networks to which access is limited to a few authorized employees and personnel. However, no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure.
